title: Forty acre development site on the East Coast
details:
This is a forty acre plot on the beach at Komari, approximately 100 metres from the Komari surf point.

It is currently a coconut plantation and has a good access road.

Just 20 minutes north of Arugam Bay and a 10 minute drive from Whisky Point this versatile plot is suitable for a number of residential and/or leisure uses.
